SEC Current Events

Source: R/current_events.R
current_events.Rd

Provides access to the SEC Current Events search tool from here

current_events(day, form)

Arguments

day

(0-5) Day to search for current forms. e.g. '2' returns forms from 2 business days ago.
form

Form to return filings (e.g. '10-K')

Value

A dataframe with one row per company with Includes the following columns -

  • cik

  • type

  • href

  • company_name

  • company_href

  • filing_date

Examples

current_events(0, "10-K")[1:5,]
#>     type
#> 1   10-K
#> 2   10-K
#> 3   10-K
#> 4   10-K
#> 5 10-K/A
#>                                                                              href
#> 1 https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1554054/0001214659-19-007983-index.html
#> 2 https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1502152/0001185185-19-001771-index.html
#> 3 https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1310630/0001493152-19-019900-index.html
#> 4 https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1502966/0001493152-19-019894-index.html
#> 5 https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1708176/0001213900-19-027247-index.html
#>       cik
#> 1 1554054
#> 2 1502152
#> 3 1310630
#> 4 1502966
#> 5 1708176
#>                                                             company_href
#> 1 https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1554054
#> 2 https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1502152
#> 3 https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1310630
#> 4 https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1502966
#> 5 https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1708176
#>                      company_name filing_date
#> 1                   AMPERICO CORP  2019-12-26
#> 2                 AngioSoma, Inc.  2019-12-31
#> 3       China Foods Holdings Ltd.  2019-12-31
#> 4                  Digipath, Inc.  2019-12-31
#> 5 Gordon Pointe Acquisition Corp.  2019-12-31
